subject: Meeting reschedule
body: Hi Dev,\nCan we move our meeting from Tue to Thu at 3pm? I'm out on Monday. Thanks, Alice

subject: Invoice 12345
body: Hello,\nPlease find attached invoice #12345 for October. Payment due in 30 days. Let us know if you need any changes.

subject: Welcome to the service
body: Hi Dev,\nThanks for signing up! Here's how to get started: 1) Verify email 2) Set up profile 3) Enjoy the service. Contact support if needed.

subject: URGENT: Server down
body: Server alert:\nWe detected a critical outage in cluster-3. Service is down for customers in region ap-south. Immediate attention required.

subject: Event: Webinar invitation
body: You're invited to our webinar on Nov 25. Sign up link inside. Limited seats available.
